job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Come put your software engineering skills into action! The Leidos Defense Group has openings for talented junior Software Engineers to come join our team in Orlando, FL. In this role, you will join dynamic Agile software teams that are singularly focused on providing world class solutions to our customers in an exciting, collaborative, and inclusive environment. You will be challenged and provided a tremendous opportunity for growth in a customer-facing, fast-paced, and engaging environment.
